name: Virtual Private Network Identifier Activity
title: VPN-ACT
definition: Identifies the activity requested for the VPN-ID.
validEntryNotes: Entry of “N” shall be used when adding a new VPN-ID. An entry of “N” is not valid when UACT is “D”.
Entry of “D” shall be used when removing an existing VPN-ID. An entry of “D” is not valid when the UACT is “N”.

Entry of “E” shall be used for those providers that require a reiteration of the VPN-ID that will be retained, otherwise existing VPN-ID is retained by default. An entry of “E” is not valid when the UACT is “N” or “D”.
usageNotes: Required when the associated VPN-ID field is populated, otherwise prohibited.
